{'title': u'Perfect primer and moisturizer', 'text': [u'I\'m not sure why there are so many negative reviews, this stuff is amazing. People with oily skin tend to forget that they still need to moisturize (I know I do!) and this is honestly the perfect moisturizer/primer. My skin is the oiliest possible skin out there and this not only gives me the right amount of moisturization, it also is an amazing primer. The formula absorbs quickly and sets the perfect base for my foundation to blend into. At the end of the work day, my face does not look like a disco ball, it is just the slightest bit dewy. If you want your face still completely matte after 8 hours, use the Becca Ever-Matte. The Embryolisse gives a matte but more natural skin texture look to your foundation, The smell is also very light and pleasant.'], 'author': u'jstbee ', 'date': [u'2015-11-15'], 'location': u'Vancouver, BC', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Kakadu C™ Face Crème
reviews: {'title': u"Odd, but I can't tell", 'text': [u'So, a Sephora staffer recommended this line to me and said it would do wonders for my skin. I am not disappointed. My skin is brighter and glowing like it never has. The thing is, I was doing nothing with my skin prior to this, so it is hard to tell whether this is a result of me showing my skin some love, or the Kakadu C. Also, since I started using the whole line at once, it is hard to tell what effect each product is having on it\'s own. I will say that this face creme is thick-- thick like you either put on too much or feel like you didn\'t use enough to distribute evenly on your face. I follow this up with a Lancome SPF moisturizer, so that helps it along. I would not necessarily recommend this on it\'s own, but if you\'re going to splurge on the line, I would recommend it.'], 'author': u'Jolie83 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Face Saver', 'text': [u'This stuff is amazing, just amazing! I had been using a different day cream for about a month when my old fav had ran out and that entire month my skin looked just off. Pores looked huge, skin tone took on this dull, blah color, broke out...I finally realized that the reason my skin was struggling was because of that cream so I began my search for a new one. Read hundreds of reviews of different creams but I finally settled on this one since my first experience with this brand was so great (poetry in lotion) I no longer used that product but I remembered liking it so I gave this cream a shot. Wow.. In literally one night my skin transformed back to how it looked before I started using that other face cream. I use vitamin C, and retinol on a regular and this Vit C lotion is top notch. Comes with a heavy price tag but its so worth it I got the eye cream as well and it is equally amazing. I will slowing add the rest of this line as well. Great stuff! you wont regret it!'], 'author': u'Ashley2708 ', 'date': [u'2015-11-14'], 'location': u'Kansas City, KS', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Clear Difference Oil Control/Mattifying Hydrating Gel
reviews: {'title': u'Does not absorb', 'text': [u'I don\'t have acne but do have extremely oily skin with large pores and was hoping this moisturizer would help minimize the shine while still providing me with some moisture. First off, the product is gel/silicone-based so a little goes a long way BUT it never absorbs into your skin. It just sits there and feels like you have a thick film on your face. Even when I wake up the next morning, the feeling is still there and all the moisturizer just gets washed away when I wash my face because literally none of it absorbed into my skin. And worst of all, the product made me break out with tiny pimples all over my face. I never break out! Once I stopped using this the pimples cleared. Please save your money and try something, anything, else.'], 'author': u'jstbee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Clogs pores like crazy', 'text': [u'If you are prone to break outs with super oily skin I highly advise you don\'t use this product. It took me months to recover from all of the deeply clogged pores this stuff left me with. The sad part is it took me forever to realize this was the product in my regime that was responsible for my break outs :('], 'author': u'maddypeee ', 'date': [u'2016-06-21'], 'location': u'Houston, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Can't live without.", 'text': [u'So I\'ve been waiting for the "it," product for my first review. This is without a doubt the best facial moisturizer I have ever used. I\'m 27, with combination/oily skin, which is amplified working in a repair shop & outdoor sales. Through my teenage years, I had perfect acne-free, skin; now I not only struggle with controlling the oil, but also painful, under-the-skin occasional breakouts. I use this product in combination with Clinque\'s (oily skin) facial soap, then Clarifying lotion (#3.) followed by acne solutions clinical gel (on the lower part of my face.) Of course I use specialty eye treatments by Estee Lauder, but everything is followed by Estee Lauder Clear Difference.', u'I\'ve strayed away from this a couple of times once my skin is "perfected," under the assumption that my oily skin is under control from improved diet, or possible hormone balance, but it never lasts, and my progress always regresses.', u'Before foundation I use Becca\'s mattifying primer, which is my favorite right now, and a undereye primer by Smashbox. All of the products I use are tried and true for my skin, but I without a doubt would not have the results I do now, If I was not using Clear Difference on a regular basis. I still use a blotting sheet, once a day, generally around lunch. Oil is considerable less than with any other products/moisturizers I have used in the past... and honestly what oil the sheets pickup simply could be from environmental elements, outdoor humidity, heat, etc. ', u'My skin only becomes more beautiful over time, with consistent use of this product! I\'m eager to try the other products in the Clear Difference line.'], 'author': u'Sdareb ', 'date': [u'2016-05-28'], 'location': u'Lynchburg, VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Winner!', 'text': [u'I don\'t give out 5 stars, I save that for products I deem perfection/ can\'t live without. However, I am in love with this. The product is lightweight and super hydrating, since I have an oil slick for a t-zone and some dry patches around my chin and mouth, it\'s been difficult to find a moisturizer than addresses both. This leaves my skin super soft, plump and moisturized, whilst controlling shine, It is amazing and a great investment for those with combination-oily skin', u'Packaging: Convenient, adorable in estee lauder fashionHydrating: Perfection!Shine Control: Winning!Texture: Light weight, fast absorption, no sticky, non oilyOverall: This is a can\'t live without type product'], 'author': u'smattox ', 'date': [u'2016-04-05'], 'location': u'pittsburgh, pa', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Light Moisturizer + SPF', 'text': [u'Today was my first day using this product and I bought it on a whim. {'title': u'BEST LOTION EVER!!', 'text': [u'THIS is the BEST lotion ever had!!! PLEASE NEVER DISCONTINUE THIS! I have combination skin which is dry on surface and oily in the pors. I have been using anything from Shiseido to NARS Skin car as well as Clarin\'s. Some work okay others not so good. Untill I randomly bout this one had no high hope but its AMAZING!!!! Simply life changing! The texture is so light and skily, non oily, very soft gentle while keeping your skin moisturized ALL DAY without leaving grease behind. I apply this after Yves Saint Laurant cleansing foam and Stella tonner, or DIOR serum. My problem skin that kept me in the dark for couple of yrs suddently felt soft, tight, and back to youth! Cant rave enough! I suggest applying this on top of tonner or fluid or serum, this lotion does amazing job sealing the moisture in and helps your super expensive serum to do its job!!!!!! reviews: {'title': u'Love the Varying Textures for Day and Night', 'text': [u'I am working on an assignment in a humid, hot area briefly and I took this with me. I am so glad I did. {'title': None, 'text': [u'I actually really love this combo. {'title': u'Mediocre', 'text': [u'The night gel is great, but the day cream does not do much to keep my oil under control. In less than an hour, I would need to use an oil-blotting sheet on my face. My face was actually less oily prior to using this day cream. I live in the swampy south, so it doesn\'t take much to work up a sweaty, oily face. Unfortunately the day cream doesn\'t work as well as the night gel. {'title': u'VERY STRONG SCENT', 'text': [u'i REALLY wanted to like this. i used to use lancome hydra zen and loved it. when they discontinuted it i must have bought 20-25 jars of it. now I\'m running out and looking for something similar that would be very hydrating, lightweight AND leave a velvety finish. this product really does all that that i can tell after just one application. reviews: {'title': u'Great over night leave-on mask', 'text': [u'It comes in a large jar and I have almost used it up! Whenever I want my face to look great in the morning I just throw a bunch on my face. Well you don\'t have to throw too much on, it works greatly as a night cream. The result will definitely show next morning: minimized pores, brightened face, smooth texture... etc. I actually didn\'t expect this to be this great but it\'s definitely my fav lux night cream right now.'], 'author': u'makeupforlifeyo ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'Nashville, TN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Feels nice, but sticky', 'text': [u'I have had moderate to good success with a lot of Givenchy products so thought I\'d give this a try. My skin is very dry, and for the last few months I\'ve been using the Givenchy Hydra Sparkling Sap Serum followed by FAB Sleeping Cream, each night. For my test run of this product I used the Sap Serum followed by this, and didn\'t like it as much. My skin felt fine, not taut, but the surface felt a little sticky. I washed and moisturized about an hour before bed, but even so, when I lay on the pillow I could feel it kind of dragging and sticking on the fabric, which is a yucky feeling. If I can find my receipt, I\'ll be returning it.'], 'author': u'delamaine ', 'date': [u'2016-04-04'], 'location': u'Sammamish, WA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u"Isn't good for sensitive skin", 'text': [u'Really it minimizes the pores, but is oily. The consistency is bad, like watery glue. {'title': u'Love this!', 'text': [u'Over the past year I have been struggling to find something that would help to reduce my giant pores and blackheads. I\'ve tried tons of different masks and products before this, and ultimately pulled the trigger on this mask because the price point wasn\'t crazy. I now use this sleeping mask 2-3 times a week. I found that the pore shrinking is better when I use it after a deep cleaning mask (like Glamglow). It\'s a little greasy and makes me a little oily looking until I wash it off the next morning. It\'s been about 6 months now (and I\'m only halfway through the jar) and can see a difference. It doesn\'t work miracles overnight- so if that\'s what you are expecting you\'ll be disappointed. So far so good for me- and I would repurchase for sure'], 'author': u'miamiamiamia ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': u'Maine', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Rx retin-a users will love this stuff!', 'text': [u'I\'m using rx tretinoin on my skin for anti-aging purposes; needless to say, my skin can get very dry, red and irritated. This stuff has saved me time and again! It is super-soothing and injects new life into my skin mid-day (when the dreaded retin-a flakiesstart.) To be clear: it does not work like the UD setting spray but it is a lovely make-up finishing spray and is an amazing soothing treat for dry and/or dehydrated skin. FYI the scent is very fresh and non-descript so I can use it multiple times throughout the day (open-concept work-setting) without worrying about boosting the place with fragrance!'], 'author': u'GretschGirl ', 'date': [u'2016-05-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Love', 'text': [u'I have oily skin and this was my first time to use a cleansing oil. This takes away all of my make-up, even the stubborn eye liners and mascaras. I do follow up with a second cleanse. Love this cleanser.'], 'author': u'ButtonsBelle ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'Charleston, SC', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Works well, but does not simplify routine', 'text': [u'I really wanted to like this product because I really love the Farmacy brand. I\'ve been using this for 4 weeks now but just can\'t handle the oily residue that is left behind. This product does a really good job of removing make-up initially, but you still have to wash your face again with a foaming cleanser to remove the product. Seems counter productive if trying to avoid using a foaming cleanser (like me). If you are okay with that two step process, then this product will work well for you. Otherwise, I\'d pass.'], 'author': u'JrRhodes ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Eh', 'text': [u'I\'m a skincare junkie and own many oil cleansers. I\'ve tried the best on the market, and I have to say this is not one of them. The formula is vey thick and drags on the skin. I followed the manufacturers directions and mixed with water. After trying to rinse this with warm, cool, and lukewarm water I had to go in with a micellar water to remove the residue and makeup it did not remove( mind you I am very thorough). I followed with a foaming cleanser and was fine. I really wanted this to work, but for me it was a definite miss. If you use long wearing makeup this may not be for you.'], 'author': u'gghairandmakeup ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The Oil Cleanser To End All Oil Cleansers', 'text': [u'I\'ve read all the other reviews about this product prior to purchasing it. I\'ve only used it once but let me tell you. The results are miraculous! I pumped one pump onto my dry hand and massaged it into dry skin--full face of makeup (urban decay all nighter foundation, waterproof mascara)--and everything came off like a dream. Normally I would use six cotton pads of micellar water to get it all off but this product did that with only one pump. After a few minutes of massaging the product dry, I applied water to my hands and remassaged my face with wet hands. Everything came off. Everything. I went in with a damp white microfiber face cloth to cloth it off...and there was no trace of makeup left on my skin. Originally, I had planned on doing a second cleanse, but the moisturizing feel that it gives me skin made me reconsider. The "film" that it leaves behind is not uncomfortable. Honestly I wouldn\'t even refer to it as a "film" because that has such a bad connotation and it was definitely not that. It\'s the feel of using a few drops of facial oil on damp skin--after it has sank into the skin. That\'s exactly the feel and, let me just say, that because my skin is combo dehydrated acne prone sensitive...that feel was most welcome. I followed with my usual skincare routine (toner, exfoliant, serum, oil, moisturizer) and the next morning I woke up with such a welcomed glow...it was unmistakable. I don\'t think I need any other cleansers in my life.'], 'author': u'kathyvangg ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have been oil cleansing for years and thought I would give this one a try. The cleanser does a good job at removing makeup, but it leaves A LOT of oily residue on your face even after rinsing with water multiple times. I have to follow up with a second cleanser. Even though it leaves quite a bit or residue, I have not had any break outs that I can attribute to this product and I have very sensitive/acne prone skin.'], 'author': u'brittany1536 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Dermask Spot Jet Neck & Chin Lift™
reviews: {'title': u'Not my Favorite in the Brand', 'text': [u'I absolutely love Dr. Jart sheet masks. I use them regularly and when I saw this I decided I may as well try it. The results were not what I expected and really did not enjoy the feel of this mask. The ear hangs really hurt and are quite uncomfortable.'], 'author': u'VBasso ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': u'Tulsa, OK', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'face treat', 'text': [u'These masks make my face feel so soft and hydrated AND reduce fine lines into the next day.'], 'author': u'mybeautyaffair ', 'date': [u'2016-05-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'too small for my face', 'text': [u'I don\'t know if my bid american face wasn\'t the right size or what but I had a terrible time in this mask. Once I hooked it to my ears it hurt! the whole time it tugged on my ears and almost felt like it was cutting! As for the neck part it did not stick to me at all. The whole time i was holding it on and felt ridiculous typing with one hand. Usually I love dr. jart but this was impossible for me'], 'author': u'lakesparrows ', 'date': [u'2016-01-18'], 'location': u'cleveland,oh', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"pleased (and it's not dry!)", 'text': [u'To those who think they received a malfunctioning product because it felt "dry" upon opening...you are incorrect. These are the hydroGEL masks so the part that actually touches your skin will feel like a gel while the top layer (not touching your skin) is dry, this is how it should feel. They\'re not all going to be wet and gooey. These are the slot treatments so you\'d be returning them for no reason if that\'s the "issue" you were having. That said, I liked this mask however pulling it over the ears was a little uncomfortable, my face isn\'t that big and I get its supposed to be a "lift" but my ears were kinda sore often 30 mins. And the neck portion was a bit difficult to keep in place. But the gel felt nice and soothing and I certainly lifted after that.'], 'author': u'masklady ', 'date': [u'2015-12-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'disappointed', 'text': [u'I received this mask in the Dr. Jart book of masks set. Majority of the masks I\'ve tried I have loved but this one was just terrible. There are two holes that you have to put your ears into which is almost impossible. Once you accomplish that task it still is impossible to keep on. After the time was up I didn\'t notice a difference at all.'], 'author': u'cklach92 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Bio-Performance Advanced Super Revitalizer Cream Whitening
reviews: {'title': u'Still heavy for combination skin', 'text': [u'Purchased it since many of the reviewers said it\'s lightweight...but for my combination skin it still feels heavy. I think I should stick with white lucent line. I\'m not seeing "whitening" effect either...I\'ve been better result with their white lucent products. Wanted to give Bio-Performance a try. Now that I did, I\'m going back.'], 'author': u'fgratton ', 'date': [u'2015-01-04'], 'location': u'Rochester, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Great for dry skin!', 'text': [u'I use this every night. I have dry skin and it really helps get rid of flakey skin. In the morning I put a touch of this under my eyes and in other dry areas. Love it.'], 'author': u'jheintz ', 'date': [u'2013-07-29'], 'location': u'Phoenix, AZ', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Misleading.', 'text': [u'I purchased this VERY EXPENSIVE CREAM in hope that it would brighten my skin. Did nothing but clog my pores. Disapointed'], 'author': u'AriesBoss ', 'date': [u'2013-06-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'1 & ONLY', 'text': [u'this is my first product review as a VIB on the Sephora website. i never write reviews because most products ive tried are good but nothing special. however, the shiseido bio-performance whitening cream is EVERYTHING to me. i have combination skin; dry in the t-zone and oilier around which ive noticed most people have become lately. i was hesitant to purchase the moisturizer because of the "whitening" title it was given until i read boinninja\'s review. i also am a guy with acne prone skin which leaves behind dark acne spots after the breakout is long gone. i use the yu-be cleanser with my clarisonic, shiseido eudermine softner, and this moisturizer. my skin has never been more clearer from any moisturizer ive used, it\'s truly a miracle cream for me. it looks heavy in the jar, but to the touch its very silky and melts into the skin without any irritation. most anti-aging moisturizers are very drying to those with sensitive and dry skin because of the tightening element in the cream. this is a must buy even though some will think the price is crazy! its just enough moisture to balance the skin, corrects and brightens acne spots without forming new ones, anti-aging without irritation, smells zenful, and diminishes any signs of flaky, scaly skin. i deff recommend this moisturizer to anyone with problem prone skin!! they say guys have thicker facial skin, so if that\'s the case and it worked wonders on me then im sure the girls will love the results as well :)'], 'author': u'kyyle ', 'date': [u'2013-04-14'], 'location': u'chesapeake, va', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Good product but...', 'text': [u'This is a good product but I found a great product on my trip to fort de france last month : nuhanciam anti-dark spot cream. The result is really amazing !!!'], 'author': u'Tommynyc ', 'date': [u'2012-06-20'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Youthful Radiance Set
reviews: {'title': u'A Must Have!', 'text': [u'I enjoy using a tinted moisturizer w/SPF 30 & LOVED Peter Thomas Roth\'s tinted moisturizer..until he discontinued it! Since seeing my favorite PTR products being discontinued I\'ve tried many others but they haven\'t lived up to my expectations. Until trying Perricone\'s daily moisturizer, I\'ve slowly been switching all my face products to Perricone. When I spotted the Tinted version in a kit WITH a travel size daily moisturizer, I knew I had to try it! I have fair-light skin tone & in the summer Medium tones after getting a tan. Not only does this product adjusts to my shade but it gives my skin a healthy glow. You only need about a nickel sized amount, start at the neck/d\xe9collet\xe9 & move up in circles getting behind ears, working your way up to your hairline. I use all of my other products first, i.e. "Needles No More" then apply Tinted Moisturizer then I put on my Smashbox Make-up Primer, then I\'m all ready for my makeup. Sometimes I use a sheer powder or blush, I\'ve never used & don\'t think any foundation is necessary. It has really cut down on the time I take to apply my makeup, only needing to focus on my eyes & brows! (Which my Husband loves)'], 'author': u'beautyrockette ', 'date': [u'2016-05-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Yikes! Just no.', 'text': [u'The face finishing moisturizer is lovely but steer clear of the tinted one. Irritated my skin, caused breakouts, caused my skin to be very oily, and the tint ends up looking orangey.'], 'author': u'marissa13 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-03'], 'location': u'Livermore, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'50/50 on this one', 'text': [u'I have olive skin and wanted an oil free moisturizer that offered all day sun protection. Representative sold me on all the benefits!', u'The little trial size night cream was amazing! Really rejuvenated the skin. Super sensitive skin but it did not make me breakout - in fact helped decrease redness! Worth trying but pricey! A little goes a long way!However the actual moisturizer - i tried it - it truly gives you a tan specially if you have light skin. The worst part was that it was super oily! Which was something i was trying to avoid!'], 'author': u'konny ', 'date': [u'2015-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love both of these!', 'text': [u'These are both incredibly good moisturizers. The tinted one is amazing - the way it evens out your skin tone. It\'s a bit more moisturizing than the untinted one. Both are excellent for making your skin ready for makeup. I love using the tinted one on days when I\'m not wearing foundation, or only a bit of BB cream. It does make your skin a tad bit darker, if you are fair-skinned like me, but that\'s not a problem for me. I break out easily and both of these moisturizers don\'t break me out. This is a very good value for the money, since both jars cost less than the cost of the tinted cream alone. You will not be sorry if you try these.'], 'author': u'momto4 ', 'date': [u'2015-11-01'], 'location': u'La Habra, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'lovely skin', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using these products for over a year. I have fair, sensitive skin which I need to protect from the sun. The tint in the moisturizer makes my skin look lovely, even without makeup! Plus, it gives me the sun protection I need daily. No product completely stops lines and wrinkles, but these products give my skin a healthy glow and definitely help!!'], 'author': u'daisy06 ', 'date': [u'2015-10-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: One Essential Mist-Lotion
reviews: {'title': u'Perfect for lazy people', 'text': [u'I used to have bunch of facial product, but not to use it because I am too lazy to open the bottle/jar and use them with my hands. I preferred to stay with dehydrated face.After I bought this product, I just pump it on my face directly. My skin did get so much better although I still do not use any other cream product.I am mid 20s, with dry & oily combo type and sensitive skin, but this product was very gentle on me. As other review said, it does contain scent, but it was not like one of those product that smells like chemical junk.'], 'author': u'EnaV ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'smells like play-dough', 'text': [u'I was looking for a moisturizer <$60 and the reviews for this brand were stellar so I gave it a try. Overall the moisturizer works pretty good but you need a ton of it to truly moisturizer your face and neck! Even after serum I find myself putting two layers of this moisturizer on to feel like I have an adequate amount for the day. Also, there is no sunscreen in this blend, so be sure your foundation (or other layers) will cover you. Lastly, the produce smells like play-dough. If I can return the product I think I will. It\'s just not worth $45.'], 'author': u'CareBear94954 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Best face lotion', 'text': [u'I\'ve read the other reviews and most of them said that it "pilled up".. The product is pilling up while removing all of the dead skin off your face, it\'s not just pilling up for no reason. I got it as a sample from the store and i immediately had to buy it even though it\'s so pricey but it\'s amazing. The product was pilling up on my face for about a week (who would have known I had so much dead skin on my face but that explains why I have white heads) but now after a week, it just absorbs into my skin and my skin feels so new and hydrated. Totally recommend.'], 'author': u'Lulu121x ', 'date': [u'2015-05-24'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Great Formula But Color Is Orange on Light Skin', 'text': [u'Goes on lightly and sinks into skin without a greasy or dry afterfeel. I dont think its meant to moisturize but in the summer I wont need to moisturize in addition to this product. The ONLY thing I would fix about it is that I have light skin, bought the light-medium, and the color came out dissapointingly orange -even for a sheer tint. I corrected the color with color correcting product and was ok but it\'s not something I can apply and go. If you have a medium skintone you should be fine. I think Dr. Gross might consider that there are more than 2 skin color categories in the world and expanding the color options would be smart. It will be hard to satisfy so many skin tones with just two tints.'], 'author': u'nicknamecc76 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-21'], 'location': u'nyc, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

reviews: {'title': u'bre', 'text': [u'I need a daily SPF. This broke me out. It might work as an occasional sunblock but for daily use it does not. {'title': u'truly amazing!', 'text': [u'I never really cared for an oil until my skin was getting really dry. I would try different moisturizers and nothing was keeping it hydrated! It was then my friend told me use an oil! So I decided to use Estee Lauder newer nutritious oil! I fell in love with the pomegranates and the radiant look my skin had! It helped A LOT with keeping my skin smooth and hydrated throughout the day!'], 'author': u'jca95 ', 'date': [u'2015-08-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A Must-Have Face Oil', 'text': [u'I stumbled upon this one day while at Sephora. As I\'m a sucker for face oils, I figured one that promised a radiant complexion and smelled like pomegranates was worth a try. And I wasn\'t disappointed. This oil has become my staple winter skin care product - it\'s a very light-weight oil that provides enough hydration without making my face look greasy, and it sinks into the skin rather quickly. I\'ll use it as a nightly skin treatment under moisturizer and underneath my makeup during the day, as it provides enough hydration and gives my skin a radiant glow. I can\'t get enough of this product. Though the price tag is relatively steep for a 1 ounce bottle, I truly feel that this is worth it. I\'ve been using it steady for two months now and I\'ll wake up with clearer, brighter skin after use. I also haven\'t noticed any skin issues resulting from this - my skin has been quite clear since I started using this oil in conjunction with the 2-Step Treatment Mask from the same Nutritious line (unfortunately, it\'s not available at Sephora).', u'Now, I\'ve got a relatively normal skin type - a bit dry at times, but not overly oily either. If you\'ve got particularly oily skin, I\'d definitely get a sample of this before you invest in it. I know that facial oils can be a bit heavy on those with oilier skin types, so be careful with how much of this you use. Yes, it\'s a lovely formula, but if you use more than two or three drops I wouldn\'t be surprised if it clogged your pores. It is an oil, after all. Also, keep in mind that this does have fragrance in it. It smells divine, of course, but if fragrance irritates your skin, I\'d suggest giving it a good trial before you commit to it. Fortunately, my skin doesn\'t react to fragrance, so I haven\'t had any issues.', u'All in all, this is a wonderful, light-weight oil that definitely gives your skin a much needed pick-me-up while you sleep. It can also double as a makeup base to give you a bit of hydration and radiance underneath your foundation. I truly love this oil; it\'s one of the better ones I\'ve tried. I highly, highly recommend this.'], 'author': u'allysacxo ', 'date': [u'2014-12-26'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Rose Balm
reviews: {'title': u'perfector and multitasker', 'text': [u'I was looking for an "all over" moisturizer, which led me to this. I was reluctant at first because of the price. But this little gem lasts a very very long time. The best thing about this product is that it\'s gentle enough to use for your eyes and lips, as well as skin anywhere. The key is swirling your fingers in the product (the consistency in the jar is like hard lip balm) so its warms up and melts, then apply to your skin. This product not only moisturizes, but firms the skin. ', u'This and perfume are truly the only beauty products I splurge on for the regular.'], 'author': u'lydi7 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-30'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love it', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this for the past 1.5 months and I love it! I can\'t wait to finish the jar so I can see the final results. In the beginning, I found the lotion to be more like a light gel texture, hard to absorb and a little sticky. However I\'m used to rubbing it in gently in circles and patting my skin lightly until it is absorbed. Once absorbed you don\'t get the sticky feeling. I love how my skin looks now, it glows, it\'s luminous and brighter! I feel clean and fresh when I remove my make up at the end of the day and could not be happier with the results. I do have acne scars and redness on my skin that I\'m hoping will fade with use. At least some disappeared so far since I do see results! The scent smells fresh, like citrus and fruits. If you have a problem with dry patches, I just dab a little bit on those spots after make up, and gently pat it in. Takes care of the dryness, doesn\'t affect make up and adds a little glow/dewy look.'], 'author': u'jennnh ', 'date': [u'2015-12-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Better as a Night Cream', 'text': [u'At first I did not like this product I felt like it was heavy and greasy, especially during the day. I have very unbalanced skin: dry sensitive cheeks, but super oily everywhere else, and tend to be acne prone.. So about a month ago I opened this product back up and use it as a night cream, or after a cleansing/ detoxifying mask. I do this because it doesn\'t matter if it is little bit greasy looking when going to bed. For me to use it best I put it in my finger tips and rub them together to warm the cream up because it is so thick and instead of rubbing on the face dab it in like you are bending out concealer. If you have a little to much then you can gently buff it out. Using it like this leave my face very balanced when I wake up and makes everything plump and moisturized. Try what works best for you.'], 'author': u'sanells ', 'date': [u'2015-12-21'], 'location': u'Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: HIGH RÉSOLUTION NIGHT REFILL-3X™
reviews: {'title': u'Fantastic night cream!', 'text': [u'I love this night cream, but not the price unfortunately. It smells nice, absorbs quickly, but leaves a soft, supple feeling on my skin. I am still in my 20s so using an anti-aging cream at this level is a bit unnecessary. I have been using this cream for 2 months and am really happy with the smoothness of my skin, but I will have to buy a different one once I run out. It\'s great for anti-aging though; my mother has been using it for years (in her 60s), and her skin is beautiful.'], 'author': u'faceshmace ', 'date': [u'2016-02-24'], 'location': u'Edmonton, AB', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: BB Bounce Beauty Balm
reviews: {'title': u'Better as a concealer', 'text': [u'The first time I bought this product, I was expecting it to be like a typical Korean BB cushion with a light, watery consistency that could be lightly tapped onto the skin. This product, however, is much more of a paste consistency, and like other reviewers have mentioned, is difficult to blend out (giving a "cake face"). I have found, however, due to the thicker texture, that this product works well for me as a light-medium coverage spot concealer. I simply use a small kabuki to stipple over any blemishes that I may have and it usually does the trick! After my first one dried out (my mistake -- I left it in the Texas heat), I did repurchase one to use solely as a concealer. name: White Marble Translucence Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Awesomely Effective', 'text': [u'When I was a young man, I didn\u2019t know better to protect my skin from the harmful UV rays being under the sun playing sports & my daily life activities. Now I just turned 43, I\u2019ve noticed some brown spot & uneven skin tone on my face and neck that just makes me look tired and old. So I decided to give this gel cream a try, man! It\u2019s awesome! I have a T-Zone oily combination skin, this gel cream is light and not sticky, moisturizing but did NOT clog my pores and did NOT cause any breakout! In about 21 days, I\u2019ve noticed the brown spot / acne scars have lightened and my skin tone is now even & healthy (younger) looking! Guys, you need to give this product a try! We men need to take care of our skin, too! I give this product two thumbs up!'], 'author': u'coolcalidude ', 'date': [u'2016-08-25'], 'location': u'Beverly Hills, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 15 For All Skin Types
reviews: {'title': u'love', 'text': [u'After using samples of this product, I decided to take the plunge. The only thing is that the sample did not specify that it was a day cream or that it even had spf, so I was using it as a night cream! Haha. Either way, I loved the feel of it: slightly thick but non-greasy, and absorbed quickly. I am not a fan of the scent, but have not had any problems with my eyes becoming irritated like others have mentioned. My skin was noticeably different when I woke up in the morning, even after the first use. It looked firmer, and more radiant. Hopefully, it should still work the same way if I actually use it as a day cream. I actually purchased a gift set at the Lanc\xf4me counter from Macy\'s that also included the night cream and eye cream so I am excited to try those out as well.'], 'author': u'jypark620 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'heavenly', 'text': [u'I cannot believe this product. Dramatic result with 1 use! Seriously. I have been having just tired looking skin, dull, large pores, dry a bit on the top, oily a bit deeper down. I read that many people swear by this for `lifting` everything up a bit. I just put it on in a whim and holy cow. Felt like my skin went straight up to heaven. So I have been using a sample for a few days and my skin looks 5 YEARS younger. Just beautiful. Even tone, tighter, pores are small and even! I know this is `lifting` but the difference it made in my overall skintone is dramatic. I have 3 deep lines on my forehead and those are still there but softened. Oh, there is this Dry skin one and the All skin one. Both have very thick texture however they sink in completely and absolutely NO oil or grease left. Incredible texture! Normally all rich creams give me large pores but this actually made them small! I prefer the Dry skin one a tad bit but they seem almost the same to me. Oh, don`t use it under the eyes, as the fragrance might be irritating. Grab a sample, it is the only cream that made me look 5 years younger in a day or two. :-))))'], 'author': u'emodel ', 'date': [u'2015-10-17'], 'location': u'Seattle, WA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Renewed Hope In a Jar Microrenewal Hydrating Mist
reviews: {'title': u'Natural Glow', 'text': [u'This gives me a natural, healthy glow- both immediately, and over time.', u'I use this essentially as a toner. I spray this on when my skin is completely dry and soft after cleansing and pat it in, then apply moisturizer once it is completely dry. It makes my skin look fresh and hydrated, and gives me a glow that I miss when I\'ve skipped it.', u'Over time, the glycolic gives me fresh, glowing skin.When I got this, I had bought a bunch of new Philosophy products and changed my routine to an anti-aging one. My skin looked incredible, literally the best of my life (many people actually noticed and commented on it), but it was hard to pinpoint what was doing what.', u'I stopped using this for a bit and realized my skin just wasn\'t "amazing" anymore. I immediately picked it back up, and the glow is back! This gives my skin a fresh, healthy glow that is what puts it over the top into amazing skin territory.', u'Its such a simple thing, and I never expected something like this to be such a game changer.'], 'author': u'kittymeowmeow ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Bienfait Multi-Vital Daily Replenishing Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Eat Your Vitamins', 'text': [u'If you really want that extra glow, take a few vitamin capsules, go for a run, and eat your veggies! This product has been causing a ruckus in just about every fall fashion magazine by editors and the like. I\'m not sure if it\'s just my skin, but I have normal to dry, and err more on the dry side. It might be a game changer come winter, but it is oily as all anything and actually caused me to break out in a few places. Use 1-2 drops and only during the day. I would thoroughly rinse your face and use something else for bedtime. I didn\'t notice much of a difference and I swear by Lancome\'s Advanced Genifique.'], 'author': u'jackie713 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Overall, I\'d say pretty great. I bought this because of the reviews, but also because I got a trial version of the Lancome line, and I wanted to see how they all worked together. Typically, my skin is dry/normal, not easily irritated, and only has hormonal breakouts. I\'ve never used daily oil before, but this one smells great, isn\'t too oily, and only a few drops cover my face and neck, so its going to last a long time. It works great on my face and I\'ve noticed a big difference in my skin\'s glow and radiance, but I don\'t know if I\'d recommend this to someone who has trouble with an oily complexion.'], 'author': u'Kalyn93 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'perfect with a qualifier', 'text': [u'I get dry patches on my chin and cheeks throughout the year and my makeup makes them more noticeable. This past winter I decided I was done looking like I lost a fight with a sandblaster so I purchased this oil. I started using 3-4 drops straight on my face at night and putting 1-2 in my foundation for my morning routine. I found that using it straight at night helped to get rid of my dry patches, but it gave me white heads in my T-zone and the creases of my nose. So I mixed it with my Clinique moisture surge lotion- total game changer. No more white heads and no more dry patches! I\'ve been using this oil for about 4 months now and my skin is noticeably softer and more moisturized throughout the day and I\'ve reduced my nightly amount (that I mix in with the Clinique lotion) to 2-3 drops per application. I still use 1-2 drops with my foundation in the mornings and it makes my makeup feel light and look even. I highly recommend this oil for any beauty entrepreneur looking to delve into the world of oils.'], 'author': u'MimiLizz ', 'date': [u'2016-05-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I love it', 'text': [u'It worth the money that you pay. My skin is so hydrated. If you try it you going to love it.'], 'author': u'gsortiz ', 'date': [u'2016-05-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'overall very good', 'text': [u'I started out using this oil on my face mixed with my usual foundation every day but the fact is you only need to use it once or twice a week if your face is only lacking a small amount of moisture. It blends very good with my makeup and makes my face have a smooth finish.'], 'author': u'Bellatragedina ', 'date': [u'2016-05-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Sunshine Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Hydrating oil-- good for dry skin', 'text': [u'I have combo skin and with the change in temps on the East Coast, I prefer a little extra moisture at night. After using a serum, I apply this oil, and then a moisturizing cream after washing my face at night. Not a total fan of the scent, but it is light. Not a fan of the rollerball applicator- I dont feel like enough oil comes out for me. It seems like a very thin layer so I have to go over my face a few times and then pat it in. Once I am satisfied with the oil amount, it does a good job of locking in moisture and my face definitely feels smoother in the am. However-- nothing super special about this oil and there are similar, if not better ones, out there with more natural scents and easier applicators (josie maran\'s argan oil as an example).'], 'author': u'peanut0205 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': u'Trumbull, CT', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'So so so average', 'text': [u'There isn\'t anything wrong with this oil. But there also isn\'t anything great about it. It\'s just another oil.'], 'author': u'HeatherSellers ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Nice Oil', 'text': [u'Received this in my PLAY box. I typically use pure jojoba oil on my face as it\'s the most similar oil to natural sebum but I gave this a try. It took longer to absorb than the jojoba and I\'m not ready to switch but this is a nice oil.'], 'author': u'bb3926 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

I am almost done with this one and will not be repurchasing.'], 'author': u'missinlove ', 'date': [u'2015-05-11'], 'location': u'NY, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Favorite makeup remover', 'text': [u'This is my favorite way to remove makeup. My mom introduced it to me when I was in high school (I\'m in graduate school now). I\'ve used it to remove both liquid and powder foundation (with sunscreen and occasionally blush) and it\'s gentle, non drying to me (FYI I have oily skin), scentless and effective.', u'I use this at night; two pumps is enough to cover my entire (dry) face and I just spread it across my face and rub it in. Since I shower at night, I just step into the shower, wet my finger tips and rub my face to emulsify the oil and rinse everything off in the shower. Because I\'m very oily and breakout prone, I always follow up with whatever face cleanser I\'m using at the time.', u'I don\'t wear eye makeup anymore so I don\'t know how effective this is with stubborn mascara and eyeliner but it\'s been able to remove my Stila waterproof liquid eyeliner in the past.', u'I\'d say one bottle lasts me around 9months-1year. I\'ve maybe used 5-6 bottles of this since my first bottle at least 7-8 years ago.', u'I\'m at the point where I\'ve stopped trying other cleansing oils because they either don\'t come close in removing makeup or are as effective but more expensive for the same amount.'], 'author': u'cardboardboxes ', 'date': [u'2015-04-18'], 'location': u'Bay Area, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Honestly this product is decent!', 'text': [u'I researched this makeup kit before buying. Some reviewers were saying their pores were visible after wearing it for a few hours. The section in the bottom pan that looks like a highlighter is supposed to be something called a "pore balm". It\'s to prep your skin before the BB cream in the areas that have visible pores i.e. nose, cheeks and chin. It can also be a highlighter as well. Overall, this kit is not so bad. Yes, it only has two colors but after a few minutes of wearing it, it will oxidize and match your skin tone. However, if you are a lighter shade this is good for you but if not then well, don\'t get it. It is 50 bucks for a small compact. In my opinion, get it if you travel a lot or you need something for on the go. I will probably keep it since it doesn\'t irritate my skin.'], 'author': u'gibby26 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Horrible. Starts out pretty, then turns horrible.', 'text': [u'This looks beautiful for exactly 60-90 minutes. And it is so very pretty. Then, things quickly go downhill. It starts looking oily to very oily for the 2nd hour (and I have dry skin!). At the 3rd hour of wear, the normal-sized pores on my nose & near my nose looked like huge, greasy disgusting craters. So gross! I honestly have never seen my skin at any time ever look like that. Plus, all the product color was gone in those areas. Tried it another day, and exact same thing happened. Trust me, if you test this in Sephora, you are gonna look so pretty. Do Not be tempted to buy it! Wait three hours. The pretty will be gone. ', u'If for some reason you want to try this anyway, be aware that the lighter of the two colors is ghostly white. The dark color (that looks medium & quite dark tan in the pan) is actually very fair as well. It was the darker color that perfectly matched my fair-to-barely light with warm undertones skin. Also, fyi, the peach tint in the bottom section is for cheeks only (not mulit-use for lips too as stated), and is a very flat, cheap looking, light peach. Not flattering, even on my fair skin. The concealer seemed okay. ', u'Back to the foundation (bb cream-whatever?) I also didn\'t like that it was hard to tell how much I was using. Applying with the small puff provided & patting it on, it was impossible to tell how much product was being picked up out of the pan and how much I was getting on my skin (I had a very good color match and it melted into my skin). I couldn\'t tell if I over applied or under. And no way this could be applied with fingers. If it was liquid, I\'d see, oh, I used a pump\'s worth, but with this, no clue. I will say the foundation did not settle into my fine lines, which is nice (most do), but then again, I never wore it past 3 hours because it looked so gross that I had to remove it; maybe it would have settled into my lines if worn for a full day. Perhaps you could make this work with a not very moisturized face, a mattifying serum, a top-notch super oil controlling primer, and a loose setting powder -- but doesn\'t that defeat the whole purpose of this being an easy, on-the-go foundation compact? I mean, if you are carrying a jar of setting powder, and a big fluffy brush, then why would you need this? If you had access/time for primer, setting powder, etc., well then you\'d have access/time for an actual bottle of real foundation that wears well & looks good all day, not a cutesy compact from Korea on which the company spent more time designing packaging than thinking through the makeup itself! Personally, I bought this for touch ups, but it works terribly for that, not playing nice with other products under it, and adding a weird greasy sheen to my skin. Again, after one hour, not only disappearing, but breaking down the bb-cream and Kat Lock it Powder Foundation that was under it, plus making my pores look huge. Maybe they should rebrand this as a makeup remover. ', u'Note: I have worn & liked/loved BB creams, liquid foundations, powder foundations, and mineral foundations, from sheer to medium coverage, so it is not the formula nor fact it is in a compact that bothers me. I just can\'t conceive of a situation where I would be happy with my face looking good for only, and EXACTLY one, hour. Even for a dinner date, it needs to last 2 to 2 1/2 hours, which is way past when the pretty in this thing has left the building and it all goes ugly.'], 'author': u'LeeLeeBk ', 'date': [u'2016-05-08'], 'location': u'Orange County, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Really good cream, keeps its promise', 'text': [u'I\'ve have sun damage on my face for the last year and I\'ve tried everything. I did internet searches and bought the creams that had the best customer feedback, but they did nothing. With this cream, I saw a difference in just a few days. I\'ve been using it for a couple of weeks now. It has brightened up my face, and the sun damage has faded quite a bit. This week I started combining it with the Cane+Austin miracle pads (peeling). That one is very strong, it stings for a few minutes after you apply it, so I immediately apply this cream to soothe my skin. I absolutely love it and will continue to use it. Note that it is a very thick cream, and since my face is very oily, I only apply a little because otherwise it does not absorb. And since it\'s so thick it seems that one jar will go a very long way.'], 'author': u'mariaks ', 'date': [u'2015-10-19'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'seeing results', 'text': [u'I purchased this and the Enlighten moisturizer cream for my post acne dark spots. I have been using this and the cream daily for about 4 weeks now. Many people don\'t see results right away and give it a bad review but this product is great. I feel like it also helps keep my face clear from acne and my makeup goes on a lot smoother. I would recommend to anyone wanting to lighten dark spots.'], 'author': u'jennacouture ', 'date': [u'2016-05-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
